[h1]Incredible game[/h1]

Absolutely incredible puzzle platformer. This game is the highest rated Steam game of all time, and it is well deserving of that title. The story telling is amazing. The level design is well thought out, and levels progress fluently with one another. The characters are actually fleshed out and have personality to them. I loved every part to this game.

Not only that, but the co-op mode had a lot of thought put into it's level design and storytelling as well as the single player, which is a thing that not a lot of games focus on. It is a really fun puzzle platformer to play with a friend.

Please pick up this game if you haven't already. You will not be disappointed :)
All time favourite of mine. Great story line and puzzle like game play.
just play the game damn it!
just play it its only a buck fifty on sales
One of the best games ever made.
A game I regret not playing a decade ago when I had a copy of it for the Xbox 360
One of the greatest games of all time. Must play.

Brilliant game that stood the test of time. Puzzles that are decently challenging, cool narrative and the sense of scale with how monolithic most structures are as well as the price tag, makes this a no brainer to recommend as a triple A single player game. Co op adds a little more to this perfect cake but if i had to nitpick most of the co op stages are very simple compared to the single player (aside from the additional courses).
The epic second part of the most revolutionary game in industry, love this game and Valve for this masterpiece.

Man, this is a good game. Puzzles are interesting, sometimes pretty hard. The graphics really suit the atmosphere they were going for, and the story... It's great. I love looking out, in the underground, wondering... what was this place like, when it was working?
Really good story and really good music. Puzzles are challengining, yet still good.
